title: Manny MUA, Mommy Makeovers, and Mayhem at the Oscars
description:
Manny MUA brings his glam tips, LunarBeauty products, and incredible story to GTL! He shares how he got his start in makeup, what inspires his artistry, and why he’s all about “you do you!” Lala has some thoughts on this year’s Academy Awards including the very funny female hosts, Beyonce who slayed, and the slap heard ‘round the world! Plus, details on Lala’s incredible weekend at the beach, and her upcoming Mommy Makeover!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
